pets.label: dog
pets.description: small, brown and white, four legs and a tail, long ears, long nose

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Small, fluffy, cream colour, pointy ears, paws

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Small, grey, fluffy, 4 legs, agile, relaxes on his back, sleeps with his legs crossed, vocal

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Small red and white, 4 legs, huge amber eyes, scared of his own shadow

pets.label: reptile
pets.description: 18 inches long, creamy colour but changes to black when agitated, sticky tongue, tiny teeth, sharp claws, 4 legs, cold blooded

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Medium-sized, black, floppy ears, long nose, four legs and a tail

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Big ears, squashed nose, no tail, sucks her feet

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Black fur, long tail, big eyes, noisy, has whiskers

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Silver and white striped fur, chases anything small that moves, lays on my lap and makes a purring drone with a beat in it. Makes a sound like meow when wanting attention or strokes or food

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Friendly, smiley, bouncy, barks a lot and wags her tail when she's happy

pets.label: fish
pets.description: Big eyes, orange, pouts, has gills and fins, and swims pretty well

pets.label: reptile
pets.description: Green, scaly, slithers, has a forked tongue and likes to eat mice

pets.label: bird
pets.description: repeats what you say, flaps wings, talks and has green and red feathers

pets.label: dog
pets.description: yelps when you touch her floppy ears, begs at the table, chases cats

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Likes to play fetch and chase her own tail, good at agility training

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Meows a lot, hisses when afraid, coughs up hair balls

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Obedient and loyal although yaps and howls a lot, good on a lead

pets.label: fish
pets.description: Small wavy and blue, likes to fight, lives in the water

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Small Jack Russell, mainly white with dark and light brown patches on her face, covering one eye. Slightly chubby due to a love of food!

pets.label: dog
pets.description: coloured fawn and white. Very shy with people or situations he is unfamiliar with. He snores loudly and likes belly rubs

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Small, brown and white with a Blenheim Spot, a waggy tail and long ears

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Small, fluffy, excitable, with four legs and a tail, a bit bitey but in a gentle way - very affectionate

pets.label: dog
pets.description: short, stocky, brindle, no tail, snorts, farts, playful, affectionate, big ears, strong, high energy, extremely friendly and loving!

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Havana brown, Siamese cross, large, fluffy, soft, affectionate, likes water, loves to eat, looks like a panther, sleeps all day

pets.label: cat
pets.description: female long haired tortoiseshell, really independent and doesn't like cuddles from anyone but me. Very good at scaring people away from the door! Blacklisted from the vets due to her temper

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Tiger stripes, silver tabby, part mancoon. Needs lots of attention and affection, a big old softy

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Buster large German Shepard ( 7 stone ) typical colouring , very friendly, very tall for his breed, great with all of our other pets, eats like a horse, moults a fur coat every week

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Labrador puppy, chocolate in colour, bouncy, bitey, loud, licking pooing and peeing machine with an insatiable appetite

pets.label: dog
pets.description: big soft fluffy cuddly but a bit scary looking Japanese Akita puppy who weighs 20kg at 6 months

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Has had 1 or more litters, many conformational problems. Active, affectionate, prefers me over anybody, submissive with other dogs, pretty bomb proof

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Rescue Siamese, intolerant, hunts, dislikes the majority of animals, dislikes affection, demanding

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Tortoishelle with a beautiful patchwork of colours; ginger, white, black and brown. She has all the traits of someone with autism. Follows me around the house all day but is scared of anyone else. Loves her food and lying in the sunshine

pets.label: horse
pets.description: Four legs, strawberry roan, long tail, soft muzzle, silky mane

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Four legs, flat nose, grunts, very windy, sticking up ears, short coat

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Big eyes, long tail, black coat, wiskers, very vocal, timid

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Small and black, part siamese, green eyes, slim build, noisy, vocal, friendly, whiskers

pets.label: fish
pets.description: Small tropical, colourful and lively. Social with other fish

pets.label: cat
pets.description: old marmalade tom, loves everyone, very soft fur, Loud and deaf

pets.label: cat
pets.description: 16 year old male tabby, recovering from thyroid storm, likes venison and cardboard boxes, recently known as Princess Woo

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Rufus, very nervous beagle trying to come to terms with his family moving and splitting up. Usually he is a dab hand at discovering where food is and wolfing it all down

pets.label: cat
pets.description: likes to stay indoors and prefers to eat fish

pets.label: cat
pets.description: sleeps in the day and stays out all night, likes chasing birds and eats anything, very affectionate

pets.label: cat
pets.description: Abandoned and slightly feral when he eats. But he has become as loving as a child. Keeps close by, and loves go play fetch with his mouse

pets.label: cat
pets.description: came to us as a stray about 10 years ago now mostly a house but can still catch rabbits. Hates the dog

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Female, with brown and white markings, sleek coat, pointy nose. Very placid but gets excited for walks. Sniffs at hedges or bushes then pushes her way into them if interested. Lifts and crooks front foreleg when in 'hunting' mode

pets.label: dog
pets.description: Soppy old boy who likes to play fetch and catch with his ball
